name: RunRScript
description: Task to run specified R script
author: t-jedel@microsoft.com

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Relative path to R script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to R script not including any named or positional arguments

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments that will passed to the script execution, available through `commandArgs`.
